TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
STATEMENT OF OBJECTS AND REASONS.
During the Budget Speech for the year 2010-2011, it has been announced that a Technical University will be established at Madurai. Accordingly, it has been decided to bring out legislation for the establishment of a Technical University at Madurai having jurisdiction over the area comprising of the districts of Madurai, Theni, Dindigul, Ramanathapuram and Sivagangai. Consequent on that, the Government also decided to exclude the districts of Madurai, Theni, Dindigul, Ramanathapuram and Sivagangai from the University area of the Anna University of Technology, Tiruchirappalli and Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli.
2. Accordingly, it has been decided to amend the Anna University of Technology, Tiruchirappalli Act, 2006 (Tamil Nadu Act 41 of 2006) and Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli Act, 2007 (Tamil Nadu Act 28 of 2007) so as to exclude the districts of Madurai, Theni, Dindigul, Ramanathapuram and Sivagangai.
3. The Bill seeks to give effect to the above decision.
DR. K. PONMUDY, Minister for Higher Education.
M. SELVARAJ, Secretary.
